ModMetaData.name: Genetic Heads Framework for [NL] Facial Animation
ModMetaData.author: SunshineyDays
ModMetaData.description:
Core framework for assigning [NL] Facial Animation heads based on Biotech-type genes. Intended as a dependency for head packs. Supports multi-gene logic, modular head packs, and fallback handling.
- Dynamically maps head types to specific gene combinations using mod extensions on HeadTypeDefs - Automatically selects the most specific match for a pawn's gene set, or falls back to race/gender-appropriate heads if none match - Includes dev-mode gizmos to assign or clear head overrides on any pawn - Adds variety by randomly selecting one of several head types when a gene rule offers multiple choices
